items.name: Brief Issue with Image Generation Results
items.summary:
Status: Monitoring

We have applied the mitigation and are monitoring the recovery.

Affected components
  • Images (Degraded performance)
  • Image Generat

What's Changed

Features

  • Implement before and after tool call hooks in CrewAgentExecutor
  • Add structured outputs and response_format support across providers

Bug Fixes

What's Changed

Features

  • Add structured outputs and response_format support across providers
  • Add response_id in streaming response
  • Add event ordering and parent-child hierarchy
